name: NYDailyNews
text:
Robert De Niro revealed he took raising biracial children "for granted," and talked about "scary" interactions with police.

He added that the topic of race is not one discussed much within his family.
https://t.co/A9SCLKEhxN

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Florida set a new record for daily coronavirus infections, at 1,902 new cases.

While the number reflects an increase in testing, it also shows an upward trend in the percentage of tests that come back positive.
https://t.co/zB6WAwjDTU

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Feds upped the ante in the case of the accused Brooklyn police vehicle bombers busted during George Floyd protests.

The three suspects face life sentences if they’re convicted of all charges brought in indictments.
https://t.co/2Ep6XSInHP

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Protesting French cops threw down their handcuffs over a chokehold ban.

“What’s happening in the United States today echoes with France,” said the sister of a black, Mali-French man who died while being restrained in police custody.
https://t.co/cFhk5bZYdk
